plot: What happens when a man tired of the routine decides to escape the chaos of the big city? The story of an ordinary man who, in an attempt to isolate, faces his greatest enemy, himself.
title: Essa não é a história de Gregor Samsa
plot_es: What happens when a man tired of the routine decides to escape the chaos of the big city? The story of an ordinary man who, in an attempt to isolate, faces his greatest enemy, himself.
original_name: Essa não é a história de Gregor Samsa
plot_en: What happens when a man tired of the routine decides to escape the chaos of the big city? The story of an ordinary man who, in an attempt to isolate, faces his greatest enemy, himself.
